articles.title: At R. Kelly's trial, jurors will be the only members of the public allowed in the courtroom - CNN
articles.description: As Covid-19 cases surge fueled by the Delta variant, hundreds of jurors are expected to appear in Brooklyn federal court Monday, as jury selection for singer R. Kelly's trial begins.
